attributes.action: halal and kosher food in the military
attributes.additional_details:
At this moment in time our military are being fed mainly  Halal meat/food without their knowledge.
Most of our military personnel are not of the Muslim religion and are force fed this meat unwittingly even though it may be against their own religious beliefs or personal views .
I petition that military personnel should be made aware of how the slaughter of their food is conducted whither it be halal or kosher and let them decide .
